Container.Name: Authelia
Container.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] Authelia is an open-source authentication and authorization server providing 2-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal. It acts as a companion of reverse proxies like nginx, Traefik or HAProxy to let them know whether queries should pass through. Unauthenticated user are redirected to Authelia Sign-in portal instead. [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where authelia will store it's configuration file.[br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Documentation[/span][/u][/b][br] https://docs.authelia.com[br][br]
